job_details.degree_required: Advanced degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Math, Econometrics, Operations Research, Quantitative Social Science)

jd: From: sravani, Nitya INC sravani@nityainc.com Reply to: sravani@nityainc.com AI/Gen AI DeveloperGen AI Python Language – MandatoryAPI – UnderstandingTelecom exp would be good to haveWorking mostly on Gen AI based solution Interview Process: No idea. Coding exercise would be happening. Location – Alpharetta, GA or Irving, TX (3 times a week) Tampa, FL would also work Responsibilities: • Drive the development and application of new technologies focused on Big Data Artificial Intelligence • Identify and initiate opportunities across the Enterprise, building collaboration, and influencing strategic direction by raising visibility of trends and issues across the competitive landscape • Lead cross-functional initiatives, develop action plans, establish milestones, and provide status updates • Drive cross functional Big Data AI initiatives, including the development of the roadmaps, key metrics, and success criteria • Manage and communicate key timelines and deliverables to execute on strategic initiatives • Stand up Ad-hoc Work Groups (AWGs) and Proofs of Concepts for new Big Data AI initiatives • Define and own key metrics and key performance indicators • Identify and leverage expertise, technological investments, and AI techniques • Research new technology opportunities, investigate industry trends, and deliver compelling, data driven recommendations to guide business decisions and improve business performance MUST HAVE SKILLS (Most Important): · Advanced degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Math, Econometrics, Operations Research, Quantitative Social Science) · Proficient in manipulating and analyzing data from different sources (cloud and on-premise), at different scales (big data and small data), and of different formats · Must have excellent coding proficiency with demonstrated expertise in python, java, R, etc. · Knowledgeable of a variety of AI/ML models, frameworks(keras, pytorch, etc.) and libraries/packages/apis (e.g., scikit) · Must have the ability to explain both the code and the underlying math used in algorithms/models. · Experience with model deployment in production environments a big plus · Familiarity with hypothesis testing, sampling, and causal inference methods · Excellent communication & cross-functional collaboration skills DESIRED SKILLS: . Must have hands on experience working on GenAI models. Ability to write code and identify techniques to use in the RAG architecture to solve for problem at hands JOB DUTIES: . Design/Develop custom RAG pipeline for GenAI solutions . Participate in daily touch point calls, design calls and interface with other technical leads and business stakeholders to understand requirements and plan a solution around it. . Provide timely updates to management on progress and any challenges. . Research and develop new solutions for unique problems in AI/ML and GenAI space. EDUCATION/CERTIFICATIONS: Advanced degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Math, Econometrics, Operations Research, Quantitative Social Science)
